ingredients: 10  red plums, pitted and chopped, 2 cups chopped fresh pineapple,   +   1/2 cup apple juice,   +   1/2 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, 1  lemon, juiced, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons ground cloves, 1 teaspoon ground allspice, 1 (1.75 ounce) package powdered fruit pectin, 1 tablespoon butter, 8 cups white sugar, 4 drops red food coloring
